name: Circuitus
description: Circuitus is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is an esteemed member of the WebtrES club. With its box-like structure, cat-shaped buttons, and flexible arms and legs resembling a feline, Circuitus is a unique and captivating member of the club. Its screen may be broken, but that doesn't stop Circuitus from functioning at its best. In fact, it has adapted by wearing a helmet as an add-on for protection and enhanced capabilities.
